thread.title: Error message "Cant find map marscity1.map" - ROE

post.author: Sulphur
post.body:
I wanted to use the ROE Double-Barrel shotgun in Doom 3 and I know one of the ways is to launch ROE and load your Doom 3 maps from there. Example " Map game/marscity1.map" but I get the error " Can't find map "

I thought it may just be the way I was typing it so I tried " devmap game/marscity1 " same error. I decided to try and load a ROE map just to be safe and I typed " map erebus1.map " and even in ROE I couldn't load its own map.


Does anybody know what is going on here? I would just like to use the DBS in Doom 3 lol Hell, maybe even spawn a Hunter or two.


Thank you.

I'm launching my Doom's through Steam is that helps any. Also, no, this is NOT BFG.

post.author: simulation
post.body:
I think you missed an underscore:
Code:
map game/mars_city1

Here is the full base map list:
Code:
game\admin.map
game\alphalabs1.map
game\alphalabs2.map
game\alphalabs3.map
game\alphalabs4.map
game\caverns1.map
game\caverns2.map
game\comm1.map
game\commoutside.map
game\cpu.map
game\cpuboss.map
game\delta1.map
game\delta2a.map
game\delta2b.map
game\delta3.map
game\delta4.map
game\delta5.map
game\enpro.map
game\hell1.map
game\hellhole.map
game\mars_city1.map
game\mars_city2.map
game\mc_underground.map
game\monorail.map
game\pdas.map
game\recycling1.map
game\recycling2.map
game\site3.map
game\mp\d3dm1.map
game\mp\d3dm2.map
game\mp\d3dm3.map
game\mp\d3dm4.map
game\mp\d3dm5.map
testmaps\test_box.map
testmaps\test_boxstack.map
testmaps\test_lotsaimps.map

Here is the full d3xp map list:
Code:
game\deltax.map
game\erebus1.map
game\erebus2.map
game\erebus3.map
game\erebus4.map
game\erebus5.map
game\erebus6.map

game\phobos4.map
